comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: Another view of two of the Fokker D.VIIs used in "Hell's Angels." The one at left has had an Hispano-Suiza engine installed after the original Mercedes called it quits. The one on the right appears to still have a straight six installed (either a Mercedes or Hall-Scott). It appears to be the aircraft that had the camera installed on the rear cockpit in the in-flight view seen elsewhere.
